name: BirthdayCountdown
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: birthday countdown
des:
Tells you how many days until someone's birthday. Any number of birthdays can be tracked on a first name basis.

Example conversations:

"Alexa, open birthday countdown for Maria"
"There is one month and nine days until Maria's birthday"

"Alexa, open birthday countdown for Miranda"
"When is Miranda's birthday?"
"October 30th"
"Only eight days until Miranda's birthday!"
